attributes.action: mandatory to have all pets nuetered or spayed
attributes.additional_details: Germany is doing right with its animals. For example, it is mandatory to have your pet spayed or neutered. I believe if you want to breed from your animals and make money, you should have to apply for a license, and pay taxes as you would any other income. Because every other pet is spayed and neutered Germany don’t have the kind of stray animal problem other countries have and their taxes are not spent on euthanizing helpless animals. They have things so under control that they are able to adopt rescue animals from other countries.
